about_the_game:
This DLC is additional adult content based on the base game. You must have purchased the base game "Deep Secret" to experience the DLC content

  • You can additionally experience:
  • 2 heroines with exquisite adult CG
  • More immersive voice/dialogue
  • Adult plot in an imaginary world view
  • More r18 content and gameplay are waiting for you to unlock!
The subject matter, content, and form of this work are all fictitious creations. Any similarity is purely coincidental. The fictitious pornographic content in the content is for leisure and entertainment purposes only. Please do not imitate it.
All characters in this game are over 18 years old

Game background

This work is based on the background of a western fantasy story. A girl wearing a cloak and a red hat hurried into the forest. Luna needs to go through this shortcut path to the castle and tell Princess Mia:
Tonight is the night of the lunar eclipse. If the promise is not fulfilled, the curse will come...
But what Luna didn't notice was the sign posted at the intersection: "The muddy path is dangerous. There are wild animals attacking humans. Please take a detour." ]

name: Deep Secret - adult patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Deep Secret is a casual puzzle match-3 game. Select two adjacent blocks with the mouse continuously, and their positions will be swapped. After the swap, if there are three or more identical blocks in a horizontal or vertical row
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
